price: 42. Mpe Allah nde Nkolo wa bokonzi bwa likolo na mabele, mpe epai na Allah nde bozongi bozali.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
